text: “Hunu gabunga ala ga mada haingadaa dono hai go digau hai gabunga, ala go nia gabunga i nia mee be nia goloo nia daangada, be go di lauwa tuaidina, be go di hagamodongoohia di hai geegee o taaligi tangada dela belee daaligi gii made, mo di daaligi tangada ge tangada la gaa made. Maa di gabunga haingadaa beenei ga gila aga, hula gi di gowaa hai daumaha hua e dahi dela ne hilihili go Dimaadua di godou God,
